other_tests.findings: Gallbladder is distended with wall thickening, sludge, and numerous stones, including several stones near the gallbladder neck. The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The liver contour is smooth and there is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 3 mm. The pancreas appears within normal limits.
